DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to define the endoscopic findings of minimal change that is significant to clinical significant reflux esophagitis. Through this, the investigators want to estimate the applicability of minimal change findings of reflux esophagitis to the clinic.
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Significance of Minimal Change in Reflux Esophagitis Based on the Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease Questionnaire
